posts.post_content: One of my favorite artifacts, even if it is a bit expensive. Get 4 of them out at once and negate the attack potential of every creature with power less than 5, not to mention the effect it has on damaging spells or abilities.
posts.html:
One of my favorite artifacts, even if it is a bit expensive. Get 4 of them out at once and negate the attack potential of every creature with power less than 5, not to mention the effect it has on damaging spells or abilities.

posts.post_content:
The "high" cost of this is so very necessary.  
It is deceptively strong, and falls into the unfun category of cards for your opponent. The fact that they have to find 6 mana to pull it off is what keeps this fair. To all of you who have faced down 2 or more of these simultaneously, you have my sympathy.
